title: nf-core/phyloplace pipeline - params.phylosearch_input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.phylosearch_input

target.errorMessage: Target name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

alignmethod.errorMessage: Method to use for aligning: 'hmmer' or 'mafft'.

hmm.errorMessage: HMMER HMM file to search sequences with.

extract_hmm.errorMessage: Name of HMM file in multi-HMM to extract.

min_bitscore.errorMessage: Minimum bitscore for hits to this HMM.

refseqfile.errorMessage: Multiple sequence alignment of reference sequences. Any format suppored by hmmbuild in HMMER (see queryfile for examples) or MAFFT.

refphylogeny.errorMessage: Newick formatted file with the reference phylogeny.

model.errorMessage: Phylogenetic model to use in placement, see EPA-NG documentation.

taxonomy.errorMessage: Tab separated file with taxonomy assignments of reference sequences.
